fields.label: Promotion Type
fields.name: is_lightbox
fields.instructions: When marked as a lightbox this will ensure it adheres to the 1 lightbox per-page limit even if multiple are set to trigger

fields.label: Layout
fields.name: layout
fields.instructions:
One Column - Tall Embedded Form
Two Column - Wide Image and Short Embedded Form

fields.label: Title
fields.name: engrid_title
fields.instructions: Title of the Lightbox.

fields.label: Subtitle
fields.name: engrid_subtitle
fields.instructions: Subtitle of the Lightbox.

fields.label: Amount Options
fields.name: amount_options
fields.instructions: Comma-delimited list of numbers.  Ex: 10,25,50,100,500

fields.label: Other Amount Label
fields.name: other_amount_label
fields.instructions: Leave blank to not allow a custom amount.

fields.label: Pushdown Gif
fields.name: engrid_pushdown_gif
fields.instructions: Use this field to upload a gif for the pushdown.

fields.label: Image
fields.name: engrid_image
fields.instructions: Main Image of the Lightbox.

fields.label: Video
fields.name: engrid_video
fields.instructions: Main Video of the Lightbox.

fields.label: Divider
fields.name: engrid_divider
fields.instructions: SVG Image Used Between the Hero and the Content Area

fields.label: Logo Position
fields.name: engrid_logo_position
fields.instructions: The video will be muted and auto-play with an infinite loop if true.

fields.label: Logo
fields.name: engrid_logo
fields.instructions: Logo Image Used on the center of the Lightbox. On mobile, it will be scaled down and moved to the top.

fields.label: Paragraph
fields.name: engrid_paragraph
fields.instructions: Content of the Lightbox.

fields.label: Text Color
fields.name: engrid_text_color
fields.instructions: HEX color of the left column text.

fields.label: Background Color
fields.name: engrid_bg_color
fields.instructions: HEX color of the left column background.

fields.label: Form Theme Color
fields.name: engrid_form_color
fields.instructions: HEX color for the form theme.

fields.label: Footer
fields.name: engrid_footer
fields.instructions: Content of the footer.

fields.label: Celebration Confetti Colors
fields.name: engrid_confetti
fields.instructions: Colors for the celebration confetti. Remove all to disable the confetti.

fields.label: Javascript
fields.name: engrid_javascript
fields.instructions: Add your own script tags as needed

sub_fields.label: Open this page in a Multistep Lightbox (requires compatible ENgrid page)
sub_fields.name: engrid_use_lightbox

fields.label: Custom CSS
fields.name: engrid_css
fields.instructions: Don't put style tags here as they will automatically be added when loading the CSS.

fields.label: Custom HTML
fields.name: engrid_custom_svg
fields.instructions: Add Custom HTML that will appear after the tab label. Useful for adding an SVG that can be styled and positioned when combined with Custom CSS.

fields.label: Trigger
fields.name: engrid_trigger_type
fields.instructions:
For Javascript Trigger, open the promotion with triggerPromotion(id); 
Replace "id" with your promotion id.

fields.label: Trigger
fields.name: engrid_fsft_trigger_type
fields.instructions:
For Javascript Trigger, open the promotion with triggerPromotion(id); 
Replace "id" with your promotion id.

fields.label: Cookie Hours
fields.name: engrid_cookie_hours
fields.instructions: Number of hours to not show the promotion after the user has seen it.

fields.label: Show On (URL Pattern)
fields.name: engrid_whitelist
fields.instructions: Comma-separated word/slug list. It will show the lightbox if the URL contains any value from the list.

fields.label: Hide On (URL Pattern)
fields.name: engrid_blacklist
fields.instructions: Comma-separated word/slug list. It will show the promotion if the URL contains any value from the list.

fields.label: Open Event Name
fields.name: engrid_gtm_open_event_name
fields.instructions: Name of the event to send when the lightbox is displayed.

fields.label: Close Event Name
fields.name: engrid_gtm_close_event_name
fields.instructions: Name of the event to send when the lightbox is closed.

fields.label: Supression Event Name
fields.name: engrid_gtm_suppressed_event_name
fields.instructions: Name of the event to send when the lightbox is suppressed (cookie found).
